meanings.definition: A cloak made of animal skins, worn by indigenous peoples in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The hunter wore a kaross to keep warm during the cold night.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate patterns on the kaross displayed at the museum.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he showed up in a kaross and pretended to be a tribal chief.
meanings.sent4: The kaross wrapped around her like a protective shield against the harsh elements.
meanings.sent5: The kaross fluttered in the wind, resembling a majestic cape.
